text: Rajpath (, meaning "King's Way") is the national boulevard of India. It is in New Delhi, the capital of India. The boulevard starts at the home of the President of India and ends at the National Stadium. == References == == Other websites == *Image of Rashtrapati Bhavan and the Secretariat buildings lit up for the Beating the Retreat at Vijay Chowk Category:Roads in India Category:New Delhi Category:National squares Category:Town squares in Asia
title: Rajpath
